categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Tarn Innis was a male Human who served in the Imperial Army until he joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War.

Innis graduated from the Imperial Academy and joined the Supply Branch of the Imperial Army, which he served in it without much distinction. He eventually became a Major and was given command of the Shallow March Supply Post, on the edges of the Outer Rim Territories. While there, he established an effective working relationship with the Alliance to Restore the Republic, as well as a number of smugglers and pirates that were sympathetic to the Alliance. He provided the Alliance with supplies and parts, but was still able to do his job for the Empire. One of his main associates was the smuggler Talon Karrde.

Innis was one of the least ambitious officers in the Imperial Army. He understood how important logistics and supplies were to warfare, so he spent his military career mastering the art of manipulating and controlling the flow of supplies within the Empire.
